Roma, Bahia - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Both pretty and warm, the roma in bahia is a finely woven filter blind allows light to gently trickle through, whilst providing a blast of country colour wherever it's used. Deftly hanging louvres can be easily tilted and pulled across to open or close the blind, allowing you as much or as little light as you please. Place the bahia in a child's bedroom, where it will match fun wallpapers and furniture in bold primary colours; or create a fresh, vibrant colour scheme in the office, where white walls and medium woods will set it off perfectly.

vertical

Roma, Polar - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Not quite mint, yet not quite aqua either, the roma in polar is a unique, icy green shade that will add a cool sophisticated to your home dcor. Soft but sturdy cotton-feel fabric gathers neatly into hanging louvres that can be opened and closed swiftly and neatly. Makeover a white bathroom by using it as the perfect canvas for the polar, supplementing it with silver fixtures and fittings; or create a gorgeous cool hue in the guest bedroom, where your visitors will love to wake up to this refreshing shade.

vertical

Roma, Fuscous Grey - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

In slate grey and with a classically unadorned design, the sleek blind that is the roma in fuscous grey will bring contemporary cool wherever it's used. Its efficient filter function allows some soft light into the room, easing it in gently without disturbing you. The fuscous grey is miles ahead when it comes to modern style, and will work beautifully with equally trendy yellows and bright pinks, both perfect colour schemes for an up-to-date living room, bedroom, or dining room.

greygrey-verticalvertical

Roma, Aqua Haze - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

There are few hues more uplifting than a gentle, pretty aqua, and that's what roma in aqua haze brings to a room. Light, supple, and tightly woven fabric provides the base for this blind, and hangs beautifully in straight louvres to be opened or closed at your leisure. Awaken to a calm, ocean feel by hanging the aqua haze in your master bedroom, where you can surround it with whites and turquoises; or use in the most contemporary of living or dining rooms, complementing with light woods and soft off-whites.

blueblue-verticalvertical

Roma, Dawn - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Simple and functional, the roma in dawn is ideal for creating privacy without compromising on light. The hardy but lightweight fabric is supple and durable, with a lovely cotton-like feel that emits quality and class in bucketloads. The dawn would look fantastic in the kitchen alongside blacks, whites, and greys for a classic monochrome look; in the dining room amongst bold blues for cool sophistication; or in the home office or bedroom alongside bold reds for a look of atmospheric functionality.

vertical

Roma, Alto - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The roma in alto is a sleek, smooth blind, with a tightly woven fabric and natural beige hue. The strong yet lightweight material makes an effective light filter, allowing just the right amount to trickle through. Contrast against chocolate and mocha browns in the living room, highlighted by gold metallics, for a comfortable colour scheme to relax and unwind in. Or go a little bolder and use the alto to accent deep plum walls, with white and beige accents to complete the look.

vertical

Roma, Scorpion - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

What better way to bring contemporary style into your home than with the gorgeous, elegant roma scorpion? Hanging neatly in adjustable louvres that can be easily slid across or gently tilted, this blind offers quality fabric as well as chic and panache. The scorpion's cool neutrality works wonderfully as part of the uber-stylish colour scheme of yellow and grey, which can be fashionably complemented with fun chevron patterns and daring stripes.

vertical

Roma, Snuff - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Combining light-filtering, easy-to-use functionality with a pretty, hushed purple hue, the roma snuff will make a gorgeous addition to any home. Its lovely mauve shade means that it can provide the perfect accent colour or take centre stage as the feature colour. Blend with deep aubergine purple for a bold, unapologetic look in the master bedroom, combining style and chic with romance and atmosphere; or have it sitting pretty in your downstairs hallway against soft cream walls and the palest of lilacs.

vertical

Roma, Lime - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Put simply, the roma lime couldn't be livelier or more refreshing if it tried. Whilst it retains the smooth, tightly woven fabric so typical of the roma range, its bright green shade is much wilder, adding a vibrant colour pop wherever it's placed. Squirt some fruity fun into your kitchen by hanging the lime as a vibrant window feature, coupled with white and light wood accents. Or go for an all-out citrus colour scheme by combining this blind with white walls and orange and lemon accents.

Roma, Mischka - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Light and soothing, the soft off-white of the roma in mischka adds peaceful ambience to any room. This matte, tightly woven blind is supple and easy to use, making it a practical choice as well as a pretty one. Add sanctuary to your home by using the mischka in a neutral colour scheme full of tans, taupes, and creams, gently accented by woods of all colours; this subtle, sophisticated look will work beautifully in a lounge, den, or dining room.

vertical

Roma, Thunderbird - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all in one. This strong, striking blind is here to make a statement, and a statement it will make. Help it along by placing against white or cream walls in your kitchen or dining room to really make it pop.

thunderthunder-verticalvertical

Roma, Grey Nickel - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The cool and contemporary grey nickel, from the roma range of filter blinds, is an absolute must if you're going for sleek modern style in your home. Practical as well as smart, the blind's louvres hang deftly and can be pulled aside or tilted with ease. Offset the grey nickel with sunny yellows, fruity limes, or bright oranges to create a trendy and charming colour scheme. Use these striking colour combinations in a bright home office, a relaxing dining room, or a welcoming spare bedroom.

greygrey-verticalvertical

Roma, Monza - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

An effective filter blind, the roma monza gently filters light whilst avoiding dimming out the room completely. Red never goes out of style, being the go-to colour for bold and contemporary looks, so this blind will last through the years, regardless of trends. The strong, striking hue used in the monza will make the perfect window feature for an all-white dining room or grey and charcoal living room.

vertical

Roma, Athens Grey - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

In palest grey on a smoothly textured fabric, the athens grey from the roma collection offers a unique yet gentle hue that emits elegance and taste, the perfect look for a modern home. The athens grey lends itself to a coordinating charcoal and dove grey colour scheme, ideal for a home office; or to a palette of deep forest greens and pale greys in the den, complemented by medium, polished woods.

greygrey-verticalvertical

Roma, Bronco - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

For natural charm, choose the roma in bronco, a medium taupe fabric with a neat, tightly woven fabric, and excellent light-filtering properties, letting the light through at will, whether open or closed. Select the bronco for a strikingly neutral home office, where you can pair it with pale beiges and soft creams. Or instead, add a tempering shade to a dark brown living room, where you can snuggle up after a long night, and where cosiness and warmth are the words of the day.

vertical

Richmond, Cameo - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The richmond cameo features a barely-there white base adorned with an array of lightly stitched, feathery curves in the same hue. Its louvres are easily adjustable for variable light and privacy, and hang neatly from their rails. Use the cameo in the bathroom, where privacy is key, and clean, fresh colours look their best. Add a soft aqua or duck egg to provide quick bursts of colour, using the hue for towels, bath mats, and wall art.

vertical

Roma, Rodeo Dust - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

A contemporary, beige filter blind, the roma in rodeo dust mixes a soft tan hue with a smooth, tightly woven fabric for a modern and streamlined look. Wherever you choose to place this blind, it will add a natural class to the room around it. Pair the rodeo dust with forest greens for an outdoorsy atmosphere in the living room, where this unusual and striking colour scheme will create an unforgettable aesthetic.

vertical

Roma, Natural - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of almost any colour scheme, being particularly suited to clean, fresh rooms full of soft pastels, such as pinks or blues - the perfect colour scheme for a nursery or child's bedroom. Or hang it in the living room amongst country greens and fresh, dainty florals, for a charmingly rustic feel with a contemporary twist.

naturalnatural-verticalvertical

Rochester, Cameo - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The clean white of the cameo, from the arch-patterned rochester range, will work in almost any setting. The heavy curves of the patterning are streamlined and fresh, working wonderfully with the straight lines of the vertically hanging louvres. Use the cameo to add soft texture to an all-white kitchen, plumping for sleek, contemporary white units and glossy tiles. Include furniture in light to medium woods, or even modern whites, and choose silver for the fixtures, fittings, and oddments.

vertical

Richmond, Pure - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The ice white of the richmond pure is fresh and inviting, and its feathery lines offer texture and depth. The sleek, clean lines of the vertical blind complement the pattern perfectly, providing a handsome contrast between hard and soft. Place the pure in the bathroom, where its clean white hue will match a classic suite wonderfully. Keep the room bright and fresh by sticking to a one-colour palette, accenting only with silver fixtures and fittings for a contemporary feel.

purepure-verticalvertical

Decor, Pure - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

For a stylish window arrangement, choose the dcor in pure, where a fusion of silk-inspired threads craft a modest blind with creative arcs and elevated stitching. This brilliantly white fabric rests on movable louvres to allow you to control the amount of light and ventilation entering the room. For a delicately stylish kitchen with fresh and reviving colour, match the stark pure with peaceful duck egg blue hues.

purepure-verticalvertical

Henderson, Pure - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

In slightly raised stitching, the henderson pure displays subtle stripes on a smooth white canvas. The colour is a soft ice white with a clean and refreshing aesthetic and, hung in the vertical slats, looks streamlined and ordered. Hang the pure in your home office for a studious yet fresh look. Team with cool blues to continue the clean, contemporary theme, opting for light wooden furniture and floorboards, then adorning with throws, cushions, and accessories in subtle blues and whites.

purepure-verticalvertical

Rochester, Cream - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

For a sophisticated window dressing, opt for the elegant rochester in cream, where fine, silky threads shape a quality and beneficial blind with a captivating texture. This exquisite cloth, with both beauty and grace, hangs on adjustable louvres that allow you to alter the amount of light entering the room. Generate an elegant boudoir by including the dreamy texture of the cream amongst alike, opulent fabrics with similar shimmer and style.

creamcream-verticalvertical

Rochester, Pure - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The striking rochester in pure contains both brilliant, white shade and mesmerising adornments. The dreamy, satin-like threads create a fascinating display of contrasting textures, producing a classy look, with the added benefit of adjustable louvres to allow both ventilation and privacy. To create a serene haven with calming hues, present the pure in your restroom amidst a soothing setting of cornflower blue.

purepure-verticalvertical

Roma, Gallery - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Calm and collected, the roma gallery's pale cream hue will set off bolder colours with ease, making it both a pretty and useful window feature. The pale colour shows off the supple, cotton-like fabric that is finely woven yet highly durable. Construct a serene, peaceful environment by using the gallery as the key colour rather than a complementary one, and place against matching cream walls and soft furnishings, with light woods working effectively as an accent; a look that will work beautifully in a master bedroom or living room.

vertical

Henderson, Cameo - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The antique-style stripes of the henderson are this time in the soothing off-white of the cameo, with alternate stitching patterns forming the striping pattern, which complements the clean lines of the modern louvres. Choose the cameo as part of the nursery, where the sweet stripes will add interest to the room without complicating the decor. Match with a soft lemon yellow for a soothing palette to encourage calm and tranquility, whilst still giving off a happy and cheery vibe.

vertical

Roma, Pure - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Roma's pure filter blind is just that - pure, in the form a beautiful snow white. This lightly textured blind will allow light to trickle through whilst offering privacy and style when closed. But you can always use the adjustable louvres to open it, and let in all the light you want. Generate a clean and refreshing look in your bedroom by combining the pure with cool pastel blues or greens; or hang in a family bathroom alongside sea blues or soft aquas, and accessorise with silvers or golds depending on your preference.

purepure-verticalvertical

Henderson, Cream - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Neatly opposing stitching forms the sophisticated stripes of the henderson cream, where a barely-there cream shade provides the canvas. The straight, vertical louvres help to form a sleek and streamlined appearance, accentuating that of the stripes. For a luxe and classic look in the master bedroom, settle the cream against matching cream walls and furnish with dark, polished woods to give a contrasting effect.

creamcream-verticalvertical

Richmond, Cream - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Adorned with feathery curved lines, in textured raised stitching, the richmond in cream is a subtle yet artistic piece, and its soft cream hue leaves nothing to be desired. Lightweight enough to feel light and airy, yet sturdy enough to hang neatly in louvres, this is a blind with both practical and stylish qualities. Team the cream with a bolder hue for maximum impact, choosing a deep maroon or burgundy for a grand look in the dining room.

creamcream-verticalvertical

Voile Fr Moondust Grey 89mm Vertical Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Voile fr moondust grey is a semi-translucent stylish, dark grey vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen, bathroom or bedroom will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in ths modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

This exquisite cloth sits on separate, tilting slats that allow you to control the amount of ventilation and light infiltrating the room. The fabric is lightweight yet hardy, ideal for a room and window that get plenty of footfall and use. Lay the cream against matching cream walls in a large, one-colour living room. The walls and blind, paired with similarly toned sofas, wall art, and rugs, will work together to create an airy surrounding, giving the impression of space and light.

Lux Raspberry Vertical Blind (Make My Blinds)

With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

Devon Whisper White 89mm Vertical Blind (Swift directblinds)

Being dimout and with a uniqu patern running up each vane, these blinds are great in any window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

The light hue of the richmond (blackout) in cream belies the effectiveness of its blackout properties, formed from the thick, opaque material from which it is made. The louvres are easily adjusted to allow more or less light into the room, and when closed, none can filter through. Ensure that your visitors have a great night's sleep by hanging the cream in the guest bedroom. This blind will match a number of style choices, particularly modern, but try teaming it with a tranquil sage green for a relaxing and convivial vibe.

On a shimmering, off-white backdrop, the ajanta (blackout) pure features a cracked white patterning that catches in the light as the blind moves. For a classic bathroom colour scheme, set the pure against blues and silvers, whether in the detail of the tiling, the colour of the towels, or the style of your sink fittings.

purepure-verticalvertical

Sarra (Blackout), Palace - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

A dark, but not quite navy, blue, the sarra (blackout) palace blind will add style, depth of colour, and elegance to any room, whilst still maintaining a useful practicality via its effective blackout qualities and wipe-clean surface. If you love to bring the night sky in, use in a bedroom amongst silvers and whites to create a midnight feel all day long. Or use as part of a naval colour scheme in the kitchen by offsetting with whites and reds, for a stylish and timeless look.

blackoutblackout-verticalvertical

Palermo (Blackout), Cerise - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Pretty in hot, striking pink, the palermo (blackout) in cerise is a bold, funky choice that will have an instant impact when you walk into the room. This blind is gently textured, so the light bounces off it prettily as it hits it. Perfect for a child's bedroom, amongst paler baby pinks and soft whites, the cerise is best accessorised with shiny silvers and white furniture. Or go ultra-modern, and team with blacks and slates to really make a statement in a teenager's room or contemporary dining room.

blackoutblackout-verticalvertical

Palermo (Blackout), Zest - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Gorgeous apple green and gently raised texturing meet in the palermo (blackout) zest, an easily manoeuvrable blind that allows you to maintain colour, brightness, and privacy, whilst keeping the outside light at bay. Brighten up a tan or beige kitchen colour scheme by planting the zest as a key feature, bringing your existing dcor to life; or use in the kids' playroom to match playful wallpaper and bright, fun furniture - it doesn't even matter if it clashes, as that's half the fun.

blackoutblackout-verticalvertical

Roma (Fr), Azure - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The azure features a bold cobalt blue that will draw the eye to the window and give a cheery, spring-summer look. It is a member of the roma (fr) range, a flame-retardant collection perfect for commercial properties, yet also stylish enough to use in the home. Transform a boring playroom into a child's haven by including the azure in a bright and colourful decor scheme, teaming it with other primary and secondary colours for a fun and vibrant setting.

blueblue-verticalvertical

Palermo (Blackout), Cotton - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

A delicate shade of white, the palermo (blackout) in cotton is a refreshing and energising blind that will help you maintain a light and airy feel even when you need the blind closed. The durability of the fabric transfers to the opening and closing mechanism of the firm, neat louvres, giving you complete control. Use the cotton to create a blank canvas in a bathroom or utility room, and adorn with floral accessories and country colours.

cottoncotton-verticalvertical

Rapture (Blackout), Pure - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Somehow daring and discreet at the same time, the rapture (blackout) in pure combines an ice white background with flits of grey and dashes of barely-there silver, resulting in a gorgeous vertical blind that twinkles in the sunlight. The pure makes a practical option for a kitchen, where wipe-clean surfaces are a must, and would be accented beautifully by white units, grey appliances, and silver fixtures and fittings.

purepure-verticalvertical

Tiffany, Dove - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The tiffany dove is an attractive and functional blind; a soft grey-taupe shade patterned with curved, almost grass-shaped wisps. This effective filter blind will meet your needs in both the aesthetic and functionality stakes. Use within a modern living room, where the walls and carpets are a soft cream, and the woods are dark brown. Otherwise, sit against taupe walls and pale green accents for an irresistible kitchen colour scheme, or to create a relaxed feel in your home office.

creamcream-verticalvertical

Affinity, Pure - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The leaf-like patterning of the affinity pure will light up a room's dcor and you'll be sure to notice it catching the light. This blind blends class with functionality, as its cutting edge filter fabric and no-fuss louvres make this a usable and durable window covering. Go cool and fresh in the kitchen by setting the pure against sky blue walls and light, natural woods. This blind would also make a pretty addition to a guest or master bedroom, where tranquillity and calm rule the roost.

affinityaffinity-verticalvertical

The perfect cream shade, the sarra (blackout) in putty offers neutral elegance and can be blended with all kinds of colours. Its gently raised patterning adds texture and depth, preventing this blackout blind from being just another block-colour blind. For a neutral and unobtrusive colour scheme in the home office, that won't distract you from your work, mix the putty with mocha browns and cappuccino beiges - providing the perfect mood for that afternoon break's coffee.

This quality blind creates a modern look with its brilliant white shading and contemporary, changeable louvres for the added bonus of your privacy and shading preferences. Use the snow in your master bedroom to benefit from its hidden blackout quality. Match the stark white of the blind with a creative, colourful wallpaper or simple, chalky pink paint.

Make a feature of the crimson by setting it against dazzling white walls and dark furniture, although most tones of wood will work well with this blind.

The soft, supple fabric is of the highest quality, and is formed into slim louvres that are easy to move and tilt as you please. The traditional room for a blue might be the bathroom, but why not team the sky with yellows and whites in the dining room instead? Or grouping together with paler shades of blue in the guest bedroom or home office? With the versatility of the sky, the possibilities are infinite.

The soft neutrality of the origin (blackout) in magnolia brings to mind rich dessert cream, and its fine, smooth surface is soft to the touch. As well as being pleasing to the eye, this blind has effective blackout properties, and is made from a high quality, lasting fabric. The magnolia is the perfect neutral, and can be set amongst almost any colour scheme. Use amongst browns in the living room for a traditional look; plums in the dining room for moody cosiness; or blues in the bathroom for freshness and tranquillity.

bellabella-verticalvertical

Anthology, Abyss - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The light, natural brown of the anthology in abyss makes for a blind that is truly fit for purpose, with a supple, woven fabric that will pull its weight amongst all kinds of colour schemes and dcor styles. This pretty country fabric blend perfectly in a rustic setting, such as a living room filled with hessians, natural woods, and shabby chic furniture. Alternatively, use in the bathroom amidst bright turquoises or lively greens to create a gorgeous colour scheme that you won't want to walk out of.

vertical

Anthology, Moonstone - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The purposeful style of the anthology in moonstone provides the best of both worlds with its gorgeous, woven texture and natural beige hue. The light, supple fabric is of the highest quality, and hangs in neat louvres for easy workability. The traditional room for such a natural material might be the kitchen, where it will undeniably look fantastic amongst hessian fabrics and woven wicker, but why not couple the moonstone with deep chocolate browns in a country living room instead? With this versatile fabric, you'll never run out of options.

greygrey-moonstonegrey-moonstone-verticalgrey-verticalmoonstonemoonstone-verticalvertical

Anthology, Cobra - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The anthology in cobra combines a rich brown colour with a lightweight woven fabric, cut into streamlined louvres that hang neatly from the rail and can be easily tilted or moved to change the light content of the room as you please. The natural look and feel of the cobra makes it ideal to hang above a workstation in a tranquil office, where light and air is an absolute must. Otherwise, try it in the kitchen to create a traditionally country feel, set against forest greens and rich terracottas.

vertical

Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

greygrey-standardgrey-standard-verticalgrey-verticalstandardstandard-verticalvertical

Apollo, Endeavour - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The apollo in endeavour features a lightweight, pliable fabric in rich, cream shade, with lightly textured patterning dusted over the top. Adjustable louvres can be easily tilted or moved to protect you and your room from light disturbances and excess heat as and when you please. Combine the endeavour with deep forest greens or rich terracottas for an outdoorsy look in the kitchen or dining room, where medium woods will fit best.

vertical

Apollo, Aspire - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The apollo in aspire is a calming, natural-coloured vertical blind, made from a lightweight, yet robust, high quality fabric whose neatly hanging louvres keep the light and the heat out as and when you need them to. Sit the aspire amongst gentle country greens, dusky blues, or muted pinks for a lovely, cosy feeling in your living room or kitchen. Accessorise with hessian fabrics, wicker furniture, and rustic woods, for a truly shabby chic style that is so on trend right now.

vertical

Splash Dove (SoEasy Blinds)

Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

Bari Spc, Merino - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

For a traditional yet modern window display, opt for the bari spc merino, a contemporary blind with adjustable louvres. This practical feature allows you to move the slats accordingly, filtering the desired amount of light and breeze. And if that wasn't enough, this quality fabric also carries a solar protective coating that repels the suns heat without affecting the fabric. Use the merino in your master bedroom to form a sophisticated colour scheme.

merinomerino-verticalvertical

Bari Spc, Astra - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

With its tilting louvres, which allow you to control the room's levels of light, ventilation, and privacy, and its solar protective coating to reflect the sun's rays, the bari spc astra is nothing if not practical. Add to this its rich, creamy tone, and you have a blind that is both functional and packed full of style. Complement a rustic country kitchen by including the astra amongst organic shades of apple green, terracotta, and sky blue.

vertical

Bari Spc, Coconut - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The milky coconut brings a warm, neutral cream tone, with a fresh and clean aesthetic, to the lightly textured bari spc collection. Sitting neatly in vertical slats, the fabric is lightweight yet durable, offering a modern look and feel. Dabble in an all-white colour scheme in the living room by combining the coconut with varying shades of white and cream, using these soft tones for everything from walls and floors to furniture and ornaments.

vertical

Bari Spc, Mischka - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The mischka, from the bari spc range, displays the palest of greys, adorned with fine stitching and gentle ribbing. Practical as ever, this spc blind reflects the sun's harsh rays, allowing you a controlled and even temperature no matter the time of year. For true contemporary chic, match the mischka with mustard yellows and darker slate greys, using the blind as a tempering accent to a bold colour scheme.

vertical

Bari Spc, Governor Bay - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Displaying a bold, luscious petrol blue, the governor bay stems from the bari spc collection, a range of practical blinds with a useful sun protective coating to reflect strong, warming rays, helping you to prevent your home from overheating in the summer. Go all out blue in the bathroom by hanging the governor bay amidst a white suite and pale blue walls. Choose vintage-inspired blue and white patterned tiles, accenting the look with antique finds and naked, unfinished woods.

vertical

Bari Spc, Pure - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

Appropriately named, the bari spc in pure displays a beautifully clean, lily white hue that serves as the perfect canvas for the lightly stitched texturing of the thick yet papery fabric. The adjustable louvres hang in an orderly fashion to convey a neat and contemporary aesthetic. Craft a refreshingly airy atmosphere in the master bedroom by combining the pure with matching white walls and bedlinen, opting for polished wooden floorboards and light wood furniture.

purepure-verticalvertical

Bari Spc, Rhino - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The beautiful midnight blue of the rhino gives a dreamy edge to this contemporary bari spc blind. Adorned with fine stitching in a matching blue, the fabric is sturdy and durable yet with a soft, paper-like texture. Complement the rhino with shimmering silvers for a modern, streamlined look in a teenager's bedroom. Choose white or pale grey paint for the walls, and match bedlinen to the deep blue of the blind.

vertical

Bari Spc, Cararra - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

A pretty shade of cream, the bari spc in cararra offers all of the practicality of its range along with a subtle sense of style. As well as the multifaceted functionality of the adjustable louvres, the fabric is backed with a solar protective coating to reflect unwanted sunlight, keeping overly warm temperatures at bay. The cararra is the ideal choice for taming bolder tones of plum or aubergine, making for a beautifully striking scheme.

vertical

Bari Spc, Tuscany - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The deep, mature red of the tuscany brings a sophisticated yet country vibe to the ever practical bari spc range. Fully adjustable louvres hang neatly from the rail, providing a sleek and modern edge to this otherwise traditional blind. Match the dark red tuscany with soft, country creams for a contemporary take on country style. Go for wooden floors and cream walls, using a similar shade of red for additions such as throws and cushions.

vertical

Bari Spc, Manatee - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

In sleek slate grey, the bari spc in manatee offers a contemporary and clean aesthetic, complemented by barely-there stitching to provide texture and depth. Its solar protective coating gives this blind additional practicality by reflecting the sun's rays to keep the room nice and cool. Accent the manatee with a vibrant lime green in your home office to bring the grey tone to life. Opt for metallic, modern furniture for a hint of industrial style, going for unfinished wooden flooring and matching lime oddments.

vertical

Bari Spc, Sienna - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The 'peaches 'n' cream' tone of the bari spc's sienna is as sweet as they come, displaying a pale, pinky peach hue with a somewhat vintage feel. The design of the blind itself, however, is sleek and contemporary, with a modern fabric hanging neatly in streamlined vertical slats. For pretty sophistication in an older child's, pair the sienna with a gentle cream hue, keeping the same, barely-there tones throughout the room.

vertical

Bari Spc, Perano - Vertical Blind (247blinds)

The sweet sky blue of the bari spc perano offers a cheery, summery hue, not contradicted by the clean, papery feel of the fabric, which is tough and durable. The neatly hanging louvres are easily adjusted to allow more or less light, air, and privacy. Give your kitchen a happy-go-lucky lift by settling the perano in amongst white units and tiles. By adding a sunshine yellow and plenty of light, rustic woods, you can achieve a contemporary country look sure to put a smile on your face during mealtimes.

vertical

Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: rigid vertical blinds are not supplied with bottom weights or stabilising chain nor are they required.
